title: Does Riot honestly believe AFK/Trolls don't deserve to be abused?
body:
I never abuse anyone without cause, never. Yet, if someone bullies me or AFKs/trolls me, I'm going to give them a piece of my mind. And then I get punished for doing this? Play out my restriction, don't get reported, I even PRAISE people with my limited chats as Riot previously mentioned in my previous restriction I didn't do anything bad, but I didn't do enough praising? (MAYBE BECAUSE I CANT COMMUNICATE!?). Anyway, couple of games later I get restricted again out of nowhere.

So here I am, restricted, unable to direct/co-ordinate anything with my team whilst the guys that AFKd or belligerently abused me, don't face any consequences. Purely because Riot has something against my account. So bad that I have to post from this account because they perma banned me from the board on my main account.

Moral of the story, Riot favors bullies

replies.body: YOU ACTUALLY GOT PUNISHED FOR BAD BEHAVIOUR ON OCE??!?!?! I'm being legit serious, I thought only Leaver Buster worked. I might actually start reporting people again then.

Well when your account gets hacked, purposely dropped you get a pretty bad rep behaviour wise. And then you contact Riot asking them to fix it, they don't, then begin to threaten to ban your account due to "suspicious activity".....WELL DUH, I GOT HACKED. Anyway, they didn't ban but they left me with the rep. So now it literally takes one report for anything, to chat restrict me. On an account that has probably spent close to $1000 on skins. Way to repay the customer Riot! :D
Once again, get an AFK in my promos. My entire team is talking, unchatrestricted, and abusing the absolute crap out of one another. Meanwhile I'm 8-2, trying my hardest to carry. No luck

I would reccomend trying to keep the team together before the game has even started, by perhaps encouraging your team, saying this game will go well, e.g. This will be a pretty good game, our team comp is great. I would also reccomend filling, as this always gives me a positive impression of a player.

That was with filling lol. And I am always positive to my team, even whilst currently chat restricted I still use one of my msgs to congratulate someone on a good gank or play knowing that I will not be able to use it for strategy. What I don't tolerate is people intentional feeding or AFKing as they are not only wasting my time but wasting my MMR. So those people deserve everything they get
"bullies"  lel. do u even inter webs
